title: Champ selection in ranked
body: Many times when I try to queue for ranked, I get kicked out because I didn't select a champion to ban or what ever but the screen never changed to give me the option to lock in any champions. I believe it's lag on both server side and my side, is this true? Every time I try to play a ranked game, my first queue attempt will result in a fail and 6 minute ban. Any one else experiencing this?

replies.body:
after switching to a public dns, the problem did not appear again however I noticed that my web pages load slightly slower than before. 

also no, i haven't tried repairing the client
Okay so I've switched to the 8.8.8.8/ 8.8.4.4 server address (followed the video exactly). I've already failed my first queue attempt today so I'll try again tomorrow and update you.
Have you tried running a repair on your client? It's odd that this only occurs on your first game.

Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) and let me know if that helps at all, If possible could you also [run a repair on your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6).
